Mouse pad as a mouse coaster: Place the mouse pad under your mouse to protect your desk from scratches and wear.
Mouse pad as a desk divider: Use the mouse pad as a divider between your desk and the chair to create a designated workspace.
Mouse pad as a mouse pad for pets: Use the mouse pad as a soft surface for your pet to scratch or chew on.
Mouse pad as a placemat: Place the mouse pad under your computer monitor to prevent scratches and protect the desk from heat.
Mouse pad as a wrist rest: Use the mouse pad as a wrist rest while using your computer.
